attributes.action: Ban disposable plastic bottles being used in schools.
attributes.additional_details:
700 Marine Species Might Go Extinct Because of Plastic.
Reference - www.onegreenplanet.org/environment/marine-species...plastic-pollution 
•100,000 marine creatures a year die from plastic entanglement and these are the ones found.
•Approximately 1 million sea birds also die from plastic.
Visit this website for more facts
http://oceancrusaders.org/plastic-crusades/plastic-statistics/
attributes.background:
To cut down how many disposable plastic bottles are being used and thrown away in school. Staff and children should have a reusable bottle, which they can fill up in school at a water fountain. 
By reducing the amount of bottles we use, it will have the environment and stop killing marine animals.

rejection.details: This would be a decision for the school or local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.
